text:
Elevate Your Impact Through     Innovation and Learning _

    Evalueserve is a global leader in delivering innovative and sustainable solutions to a
    diverse range of clients, including over 30% of Fortune 500 companies. With a
    presence in more than 45 countries across five continents, we excel in leveraging
    state-of-the-art technology, artificial intelligence, and unparalleled subject matter
    expertise to elevate our clients' business impact and strategic decision-making. Our
    team of over 4,500 talented professionals operates in countries such as India, China,
    Chile, Romania, the US, and Canada. Our global network also extends to emerging
    markets like Colombia, the Middle East, and the rest of Asia-Pacific. Recognized by
    Great Place to Work® in India, Chile, Romania, the US, and the UK in 2022, we offer a
    dynamic, growth-oriented, and meritocracy-based culture that prioritizes
    continuous learning and skill development, work-life balance, and equal opportunity
    for all.
    Curious to know what it’s like to work at Evalueserve?

    Role    Intormation

    Job Title         Managing Technical Architect

     Location         United States (Remote with Travel)

    Nature of Job     Full Time - Fixed Contract

    Department        Data Analytics

    About Data Analytics (DA)

    Data Analytics is one of the highest growth practices within Evalueserve, providing you
    rewarding career opportunities. Established in 2014, the global DA team extends beyond
    1000+ (and growing) data science professionals across data engineering, business
    intelligence, digital marketing, advanced analytics, technology, and product engineering. Our
    more tenured teammates, some of whom have been with Evalueserve since it started more
    than 20 years ago, have enjoyed leadership opportunities in different regions of the world
    across our seven business lines.

    Click   here     to know more.


    Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)
Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information
                                           information.
    www.evalueserve.com

---

    What you will be doing at  Evalueserve

    •     Lead the development for software and data engineering projects for a key
          Evalueserve client in the financial services industry
    •     Define software development standards, methodology and process
    •     Plan software development sprints and monitor progress with industry standard
          metrics
    •     Guide a diverse team of senior and intermediate software developers and data
          engineers
    •     Full-range of programming tasks – including problem analysis, solution
          determination, code design and architecture
    •     Development, integration, UAT and regression testing and documentation
    •     Collaborate closely with the multiple Business SMEs, product managers, and
          senior leadership to understand requirements and propose solutions and
          roadmaps
    •     Coordinate with infrastructure teams to define and implement CICD processes for
          solutions
    •     Troubleshoot/remediate any identified issues
    •     Jointly work with other teams and partners to handle different aspects of the
          product creation, reviewing and mentoring


    Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)
Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information
                                           information.
    www.evalueserve.com

---

    What we’re looking for

    •     7-12 years of experience of working in financial services development
    •     Experience leading global development teams
    •     Experience developing secured and high-performance Finance IT applications
    •     Strong hands-on back and front-end programming experience with React and
          Node.js
    •     Data Modeling experience
    •     Experience with relational databases (SQL Server preferred)
    •     Experience working with GitHub
    •     Experience working with Scrum Methodology
    •     Understanding of data pipelines and ETL/ELT process
    •     Understanding of CICD processes
    •     Understanding of Hadoop based data lakes
    •     Understanding of Snowflake, Databricks, and Power BI
    •     Familiarity with various operating systems, databases and cloud environments
          (private and public)
    •     Understanding of Generative AI solutions


    Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)
Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information
                                           information.
    www.evalueserve.com

---

    Follow us on https://www.linkedin.com/company/evalueserve/

    Click here to learn more about what our Leaders talking on achievements AI-powered supply
    chain optimization solution built on Google Cloud.

    How Evalueserve is now Leveraging NVIDIA NIM to enhance our AI and digital transformation
    solutions and to accelerate AI Capabilities.

    Know more about how Evalueserve has climbed 16 places on the “50 Best Firms for Data
    Scientists in 2024”!


                                                                           Want to learn more about our culture and what it’s like to work with us?

                                                                                           Write to us at: careers@evalueserve.com

    Grea Grea Great   eat eat                    FORRESTER                     S888                               DiM
    Piacc Place Place ace ace                                                          BRONZE
    To  To                                        WAVE STRONG                                            2022     BEST FIRM FOR
    Work Work Worke   Ork ork                     PERFORMER 2023                                     ecovadis     DATa SCIEHTISTS0
    Certifi Certifi Certified rtified rtified     tomoblive                    MIGRANTE    Sustainabillty         2022 S

        Fintech                                             Chartis quadtan    Ri82823                       GULDEU pEACOCK
              Khard                                   Calegory Leader; 2023

                                                 Mocdkel valkkilan


    Disclaimer: The following job description serves as an informative reference for the tasks you may be required to
    perform. However, it does not constitute an integral component of your employment agreement and is subject to
    periodic modifications to align with evolving circumstances.


    Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)
Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information
                                           information.
    www.evalueserve.com

pages.md:
Elevate Your Impact Through Innovation and Learning

Evalueserve is a global leader in delivering innovative and sustainable solutions to a diverse range of clients, including over 30% of Fortune 500 companies. With a presence in more than 45 countries across five continents, we excel in leveraging state-of-the-art technology, artificial intelligence, and unparalleled subject matter expertise to elevate our clients' business impact and strategic decision-making. Our team of over 4,500 talented professionals operates in countries such as India, China, Chile, Romania, the US, and Canada. Our global network also extends to emerging markets like Colombia, the Middle East, and the rest of Asia-Pacific. Recognized by Great Place to Work® in India, Chile, Romania, the US, and the UK in 2022, we offer a dynamic, growth-oriented, and meritocracy-based culture that prioritizes continuous learning and skill development, work-life balance, and equal opportunity for all.

Curious to know what it’s like to work at Evalueserve?

# Role Information

| Job Title     | Managing Technical Architect       |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------- |
| Location      | United States (Remote with Travel) |
| Nature of Job | Full Time - Fixed Contract         |
| Department    | Data Analytics                     |

# About Data Analytics (DA)

Data Analytics is one of the highest growth practices within Evalueserve, providing you rewarding career opportunities. Established in 2014, the global DA team extends beyond 1000+ (and growing) data science professionals across data engineering, business intelligence, digital marketing, advanced analytics, technology, and product engineering. Our more tenured teammates, some of whom have been with Evalueserve since it started more than 20 years ago, have enjoyed leadership opportunities in different regions of the world across our seven business lines.

Click here to know more.

Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)

Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information.

www.evalueserve.com

pages.md:
# What you will be doing at Evalueserve

- Lead the development for software and data engineering projects for a key Evalueserve client in the financial services industry
- Define software development standards, methodology and process
- Plan software development sprints and monitor progress with industry standard metrics
- Guide a diverse team of senior and intermediate software developers and data engineers
- Full-range of programming tasks – including problem analysis, solution determination, code design and architecture
- Development, integration, UAT and regression testing and documentation
- Collaborate closely with the multiple Business SMEs, product managers, and senior leadership to understand requirements and propose solutions and roadmaps
- Coordinate with infrastructure teams to define and implement CICD processes for solutions
- Troubleshoot/remediate any identified issues
- Jointly work with other teams and partners to handle different aspects of the product creation, reviewing and mentoring

Evalueserve (One Glenwood Ave, 5ᵗʰ floor, Raleigh, NC 27603)

Read our Privacy policy - Evalueserve to learn how Evalueserve processes your personal information.

www.evalueserve.com
